Command.CommandString: insert into SC_I_ORDERMASTER(OrderDate, DeliveryDate, BatchNo, OrderId, RouteCode, CustomerCode, DeliveryAdd, Creator, CreateDate, Updater, UpdateDate) values(@OrderDate, @DeliveryDate, @BatchNo, @OrderId, @RouteCode, @CustomerCode, @DeliveryAdd, @Creator, getdate(), @Updater, getdate())

update SC_I_ORDERMASTER set OrderDate=@OrderDate, DeliveryDate=@DeliveryDate, BatchNo=@BatchNo, RouteCode=@RouteCode, CustomerCode=@CustomerCode, DeliveryAdd=@DeliveryAdd,Updater=@Updater, UpdateDate=getdate() where OrderId=@OrderID
delete from SC_I_ORDERMASTER where OrderId in ({0})

insert into SC_I_ORDERDETAIL( OrderId, RowID, ProductCode, ProductName, Quantity, OrderDate, DeliveryDate, BatchNo, Price, Amount, Memo) values(@OrderId, @RowID, @ProductCode, @ProductName, @Quantity, @OrderDate, @DeliveryDate, @BatchNo, @Price, @Amount, @Memo)
delete from SC_I_ORDERDETAIL where OrderId in ({0})
delete from WMS_BillMaster where BillId in ({0})
delete from WMS_BillDetail where BillId in ({0})
insert into WMS_BillMaster(BillID, BillDate, BillTypeCode,Memo,Creator, CreateDate, Updater, UpdateDate) values( @BillID,@BillDate, @BillTypeCode,@Memo,@Creator, getdate(), @Updater, getdate())
update WMS_BillMaster set BillDate=@BillDate, BillTypeCode=@BillTypeCode , Memo=@Memo, Updater=@Updater, UpdateDate=getdate() where BillID=@BillID
delete from WMS_BillDetail where BillID in ({0})
